attributes.action: make all serving members of the Armed Forces exempt from income tax on their salaries earned from the Armed Forces
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The Armed Forces are unique in what they do for the country and the environment they are required to do it in. The pay for soldiers, sailors and airmen is scandalous even before tax and much worse afterwards. Not only would the exemption from all income tax be a huge "thank you" to our servicemen and women, it would also be an incredible recruitment and retentiont ool.

rejection.details: This petition overlaps with several already in existence - http://petitions.pm.gov.uk/contributing/
reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
